name: Escape From Dungeon
description:
Escape From Dungeon is 3D an Action-Adventure game where you can play as Knight and fight against the skull guards. Escape From Dungeon revolves around a place of dungeon (underground prison) surrounded by hot lava. In the game, the player will use a knight character who must get out of the dungeon. In order to succeed in getting out of the dungeon, the player must defeat all the skull guards who block and save the other prisoners.

This is my last project at the university in 2018. Hope you enjoy my game!
